title: Is it possible to create an algorithm that can take anyone's voice and convert it into a standard voice? - Quora

response.answer_text: As long as you don’t have too heavy an accent for the voice recognition to work, yes, there are many voice changing programs and Apps out there. Not sure what you mean by “standard”; it’s probably not going to make you sound like Water Cronkite.

There would be several stages. First, discerning what is being said (the words, pacing, and inflection). Next, translating the whole to eliminate any cultural bias (I.e; sanitizing it). Now, the hard part: deciding what “standard” speech sounds like. As of now, I know of no such thing. Once you’ve worked that out, then Translate the words into the new mapping.
